name: Mushroom Melody
description:
The secrets of the forest call to you when you hear strange music... and you discover a colony of melodic mushrooms!

This little project is a music making game where you spawn different kinds of mushrooms and tell them what note to sing and when.

Controls:

LEFT / ARotate log counterclockwiseRIGHT / DRotate log clockwiseUP / WShoot spore above conductorDOWN / SPlant spores under conductorMOUSE SCROLLChange mushroom typeENTEROpen and close musical menuLEFT CLICKSelect notes in menu1 - 5Resolution change (press 5 to full screen)ESCExit

There is limited controller support, using the musical menu with gamepad is not implemented yet.

Enjoy your journey on creating musical wonders with these singing mushrooms!
